description:
OVERVIEW: Learn how to raise $10,000 by designing a one-of-a-kind crowdfunding campaign. Learn how to set goals and better prepare yourself for a campaign launch. Once your campaign launches, you'll be an expert on methods of raising the most money, and how to design a professional page.

A Letter to you from, Crowdfunding Expert, Justin Massion:

I've made helped crowdfund over $750,000 in funds raised across many projects. While doing so, i've tracked my steps at every turn, cross compared every campaign, and documented the key aspects of a successful campaign.

My experience has really paid off ... and the techniques that worked best are revealed to you here.

I now get phone calls every day, being asked to run peoples campaigns for them, and to give advice. Some people need millions, and some only need a few hundred bucks. However, everyone needs to know how to bring the 1st monies in the door. This course teaches you how to do that.

Enrol now!
title: Fundraise the Simplified Way: A Crowdfunding Blueprint
